text:
It seems Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas’s wedding after-party was just as spontaneous as them tying the knot in the first place. The couple shocked everyone by getting married in a quickie Las Vegas ceremony Wednesday night following the Billboard Music Awards—and it looks like they celebrated by taking another kind of plunge.

According to Instagram stories reshared by the Daily Mail, the newly minted bride and groom celebrated with their friends by jumping into their hotel hot tub fully clothed at their after-party. Jonas still had on his gray tuxedo and the bride was wearing a white bridal jumpsuit look, all the way down to her Gucci shoes. The party reportedly lasted late into the night.

The wedding came as a complete surprise since the couple had been very vocal about their wedding plans. They previously announced they would get married this summer in France. But when in Vegas, am I right?

We imagine the night went off a little differently than the wedding they originally planned. Diplo, who performed at the wedding, served as the videographer documenting the night via Instagram stories. Turner walked down the aisle with a white bouquet featuring flashing blue lights to a live performance of “Speechless” by Dan + Shay. The wedding was officiated by an Elvis impersonator, according to People, and the two exchanged Ring Pops instead of wedding bands before posing in Elvis glasses on the chapel’s famed pink Cadillac for wedding photos.

Nick and Kevin Jonas stood by Joe’s side for the big moment, and Turner’s now official sister-in-law Priyanka Chopra reportedly served as the maid of honor. Conveniently held after the Billboard Music Awards, the ceremony was attended by other celebrities, including singer Khalid.

See more: How to Plan a Surprise Wedding Ceremony

While we’re SO excited for the happy couple, we do have to wonder, was the France wedding just a ruse?! Maisie Williams was supposed to be Turner’s maid of honor and she wasn’t even in attendance. And Joe wanted a flag rugby game at the wedding, so how could a wedding at the Chapel L’Amour in A Little White Wedding Chapel suffice?
title: The Perfect Way Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner Celebrated Their Vegas Wedding
